text: Mikhail Alexandrovich Antonov (; born 4 January 1986) is a Russian former professional cyclist. ==Major results== ;2009 :1st Mayor Cup :1st Memorial Oleg Dyachenko ;2010 :1st Overall Circuit des Ardennes ::1st Stage 1 :1st Overall Tour du Loir-et-Cher ;2011 :1st Stage 5 Tour du Loir-et-Cher :2nd Central European Tour Miskolc GP ;2012 :3rd Overall Vuelta a La Rioja ==References== ==External links== * Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Russian male cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Izhevsk
title: Mikhail Antonov
